summary: The ego vehicle approaches an intersection with several large trucks parked on the right side of the road. The road appears to be under construction or in a state of disrepair. A motorcycle and its rider are lying on the road in front of the ego vehicle.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Trucks are stationary. A person is standing next to a motorcycle that is lying on the road.
characters: A person is visible standing next to the motorcycle.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, trucks, motorcycle, person, intersection
key_actions: The motorcycle and rider are lying on the road, creating a potential hazard for the ego vehicle. The person is attempting to right the motorcycle.
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely slow down and navigate around the motorcycle and person.
